system.requirement: If you wield a macuahuitl, an obsidian edged wooden paddle...

abilities.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} with the intent to permanently maim your opponent (decide before rolling), change the lower challenge die value to the higher challenge die value. Then, inflict +2 harm on a strong hit.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.7e008d0f656dc8b3]{Clash} with the flat of the macuahuitl to daze your foe, add +1. On a hit, inflict I harm (instead of 2) and you have the initiative.
